title: Thaka Thayya Lyrics Alex Pandian Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Karthik
Lyrics: Viveka
Movie: Alex Pandian
Music: Devi Sri Prasad		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Oye maama ponna thaanu thimuraa
ketadhu oru kaalam
Ippa matrimonoyil ponna thaedi
loose-ah alayirom

Nam veetu pakkathula irukum neighbour
perey theriyaadhu
facebook-la ulagam pooraa frienda thaedurom

Ye pulla meenaachi unga anna vela
ennaachu, ippadiyellam
naama enga pesurom

Yellaam kaiyil cell phone-u
adhil cinema patu ringtone-u
manasa vittu pesa marandhu
poli vazhka thaan vaazhurom

Thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya
indha uravugal illaa ulagam waste ayyaaa
Thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya
ada ovvoru uravum ovvoru sugam ayyaaa

Hey appanoda appa pera marakurom
pillaku sachin-dhoni pera vachi vazhakurom

appa appa adha kathuthara marandhutu
pinnaala pozhamburom

TV petti munna nidham kidakurom
adhil thembi azhum penna kandu urugurom
paaka vandha sondhagalai kaaka vachi
paasatha panchar aaki anupurom

Thaalaatu paatellaam kaanaama pocheda
kuthu paata kettuthaan ippa
pacha kulandhaiyum thoongudhu

Thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya
indha uravugal illaa ulagam waste ayyaaa
Thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya
ada ovvoru uravum ovvoru sugam ayyaaa

Hey kattu kattaa panam vandhu payanillai
ponna kaatikka konjam sondham venum maapila
naadu naadu suthinaalum veedu vandhu
serum podhu nimmadhi porakkumey

Anna thambi sanda kooda nadakaalaam
adhil aalukoru pallu kooda udayalaam
veroruthan yaarum vandhu annan mela
kaiyya vacha thambi manam thudikumey

Kaa kaa-nu sonnaalem kaaki kooda kootamvarum
paadaana manusan thaaney paadhi paadhiya vazhuran

Thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya
indha uravugal illaa ulagam waste ayyaaa
Thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya thakka thaiyya
ada ovvoru uravum ovvoru sugam ayyaaaEnglish Translation
I tried my best :)
